column4: I'm trying to get Mplayer to work.  It says,"Error Opening/Initializing the selected video_out (-vo) device.  So I go to the FAQ and it tells me how to bring up a list of VO devices I have.  Then it tells me to pick the 'correct' one.  It doesn't tell me how to determine what the correct one is.  Help?
have you tried vlc player it has most codecs inbuilt?
if you are talking Movie player, I gave that away after a while due to problems.
read that kaffeine was a pretty good movie player but cannot vouch for it myself
